description: Support the development of an inclusive financial sector in Mozambique that benefits the poor people, particularly the youth and women in rural areas

subproject.description: The Building Inclusive Finance project aims at creating conditions for the development and implementation of Inclusive financial services in Mozambique that benefits the poorest population of the country, including especially the youth and women in rural areas. This will be achieved through the design and implementation of an appropriate micro-finance and respective action plan, as well as the creation of an adequate capacity for provision of microfinance training for the microfinance services providers for them to adopt the inclusive finance approach. .
subproject.gender code: Gender equality as a significant objective
